name.description: The sub-job name. It should be within the specified enum for consistency

endpoint.description: The request endpoint. It should be within the specified enum for consistency

operation.description: The HTTP operation for the request

path_parameters.description: The endpoint path parameters. Storage variables or exact values can be used.

query_parameters.description: The query parameters to be sent along with the request

polling.description: The polling object containing polling configuration

interval.description: The polling interval between each request in seconds. String value allowed to define variable in template, otherwise numeric value.

timeout.description: The polling timeout in seconds. String value allowed to define variable in template, otherwise numeric value.

request_body.description: The request body for the request

storage_vars.description: Extract values from response and store into provided keys. Provide location of key from response root in dot notation

filter.description: The list of filters to be applied on API data

response.description: The expected response status for the given endpoint details

path.description: The API data key path to filter the value. Provide location of key from root in dot notation

type.description: The data type of the response field to filter

regex.description: Filter the string value via regex. Should be used only with "string" type

value.description: The value to be filtered. For object, it checks if provided value is subset of filtered response field, regardless of the key-value pairs order.

size.description: The size of the response field is interpreted differently for each type of data. For a string, it refers to the length of the string; for an array, it refers to the size of the array; and for an object, it refers to the number of key-value pairs in the object.
